name: Dark Harvest (stealthgun)
description:
Dark Harvest is a top down action RPG using the Paragon Assets.

An evil has woken up and is destroying the world, you need to save the world from destruction by harvesting their souls!

In order to play the game you will need to create an game account here.

The game offers:

  • Six playable (Handcrafted worlds) worlds
  • Ten playable heroes
  • Ten Difficulty settings
  • Quests
  • Achievements
  • Social features
  • Multiplayer Co-op (not yet implemented)
  • Cosmetic Micro-transactions

Current state:
Currently the game is under heavy development and will change over time.

It is recommend that you use the launcher to start the game, the launcher will give you updates when they come available so you will always play the latest released version of the game.

Game is being developed using the Unreal Engine 4.

Gameplay:
A gameplay video for the hero Countess can be found here: 

Requirements

Minimum
CPU: Core i5 2.5 Ghz
RAM: 4 GB
OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bits
VIDEO CARD: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 6870 equivalent DX11 GPU
HDD: 35GB of free space

Recommended
CPU: Core i5 2.8 Ghz
RAM: 8 GB
OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bits
VIDEO CARD: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 equivalent DX11 GPU
HDD: 35GB of free space
